lines.text:
[over the phone]
Detective Harry Ball?
Who the hell is this?
Just call me "Deep Throat"
You expect me to swallow that?

You have the right to shut up. Anything you say, can and will piss me off! If you can't afford a shyster attorney, we will assign you an overworked loser, who doesn't give a shit and will screw up your case anyway. Now, do you understand your rights?
Yeah, I understand. This is a total frameup. Speaking of rights, where's your warrant anyway?
Huh? What?

[checking pockets and finding nothing]
Shit!
[after looking at a series of portraits of Holly So Tightly alongside famous singers]
Unbelievable!
What is?
You've humped half of my record collection.
Whatever...
I knew it all along. But why? Huh? Why?
Why do you think? Johnny, Eric, Bart... they didn't love me. All they wanted was sex!
You're a fucking porn star. What the hell do you expect?
I'm not whore! Like help put my career, some real respect, and maybe a half decent orgasm once in a while!
What about Ronnie? Huh?
Figure it out, "Encyclopedia Brown"!
[after asking Holly So Tightly casual questions]
...and how does it feel to be called "the biggest star fucker in the business"?
[Holly So Tightly looks at the reporter with a sour face]
[Holly So Tightly suddenly stops her car around the runaway Dirt Merchant]
Come with me if you wanna leave.
Huh?
Don't worry, I know you're innocent!
You do?
Just get in the car!
[after Dirt Merchants' roommates get paid by a reporter and start talking provocatively about him]
Consider yourself lucky...
[pulls Dirt Merchant to bed with her]
...at least you still have friends!
My last three guys... Eric, Bart, John... dead! Gone!
[puts her arm around him and starts crying]
I mean, do I have bad Karma or what?
Maybe, you know... but ah... well, sometimes... shit just happens.
Ah... you are so understanding.
Thanks.
Kiss me, you tool!
[kisses him]
[after Dirt Merchant joins Holly So Tightly per her request in centering himself via meditation]
Ok, I'm centered. Now do me dirty, Dirt!
[jumps him]
[Holly So Tightly mounts Dirt Merchant aggressively in a pool's corner]

[afterwards]
I hope you don't mind me using you like a hapless sack of meat. But you know, sometimes a girl just gotta have it.

[breathing to relax]
Yeah, no problem, I guess...
[Holly So Tightly walks around the pool topless after she slept with Dirt Merchant]
Watching her reminded me of something Sly would have said. "There's no such thing as fake tits".
God Dirt, what are you doing with your life anyway?
Look obviously this was a bad idea and I have to get back for a meeting. You have my card, maybe we can do lunch sometime.
Sure, that'd be great. You know, thanks for coming by. It was really nice seeing you and er, congratulations on your new job.
You really mean it?
Sure. Happy for you Ang.
Thanks, call me okay? Let's be friends.
Absolutely.
Angie, how are you?
Yeah, I need to hire a detective.
To do what?
Find a missing person.
Who might that be?
My ex-boyfriend.
What is his name again?
Dirt, if he doesn't kiss me right now.
[they go to kiss each other but Dirt stops it]
Wait just so you're aware.
Of what?
That we're friends, just friends.
Whatever.
[they kiss]
